      New York Bakery Co. Plain Bagels

      (179)
      Rating, 4.1 out of 5 from 179 reviews.
      Life 5d+Product life guaranteed for 5 days excluding delivery day.
      5 per pack £0.38 per item5 per pack(£0.38 per item)
      £1.90

      Offers

      Buy NYB Bagels and Skippy Peanut Butter, save 15%Buy NYB Bagels and Skippy Peanut Butter, save 15%. Order by 07/10/2025, offer subject to availability. Maximum 18 promotional items per customer.

      Product attributes

      Suitable for freezing
      Vegetarian
      Vegan
      Ocado Price Promise

      Shop all New York Bakery

      Product Information

      The Real Deal
      Deliciously soft & chewy boiled & stone baked bagels

      Features

      Versatile Bagels, Authentic New York Style Bagels, Soft & Chewy for an Authentic NY Taste, Low in Fat, Free from Artificial Colours & Flavours, Suitable for Vegans & Vegetarians

      Further description

      For more great recipes across our Bagel Thins range, check our website at www.newyorkbakeryco.com

      Country of origin

      United Kingdom

      Nutritional data

      Typical ValuesPer 100gPer Bagel
      Energy271kcal230kcal
      Fat2.6g2.2g
      (of which saturates)0.9g0.8g
      Carbohydrate47.6g40.5g
      (of which sugars)5.2g4.4g
      Fibre3.1g2.6g
      Protein9.8g8.3g
      Salt0.62g0.53g
      1 serving = 1 bagel (85g)

      Storage

      Suitable for Home Freezing

      Preparation and Usage

      See below for inspiration across the range
      Perfect for breakfast
      Sweet Breakfast - The Original Bagel, toasted and topped with cream cheese, blueberries & honey

      Great choice for lunch
      Lunch Favourite - Wholemeal Bagel topped with crushed avocado, crumbled feta and flecks of chilli

      Great for speedy snacking!
      Sweet Treat - Cinnamon & Raisin Bagel with sliced banana and a light sprinkle of cinnamon

      Package type

      Bag

      Recycling information

      Packing - Recycle with carrier bags at larger stores - Not at Kerbside

      Other Information

      Full Product Name:
      5 Plain Bagels

      Storage:
      For best before date: See bag closure
      Store in a cool dry place. Suitable for freezing. Freeze on day of purchase & use within one month. Defrost thoroughly before use.

      Usage:
      1 Servings

      Additional Information:
      Bagels

      Ingredients

      Wheat Flour (Wheat Flour, Calcium Carbonate, Iron, Niacin, Thiamin), Water, Sugar, Yeast, Maize, Salt, Rapeseed Oil, Spirit Vinegar, Preservative (Calcium Propionate), Sweet Potato Puree, Malted Barley Flour, Flour Treatment Agent (Ascorbic Acid)

      Allergen Information

      Contains Barley, May Contain Sesame, Contains Wheat
      May contain traces of Sesame.

      Dietary Information

      Low Fat; Suitable for Vegans; Suitable for Vegetarians

      Brand

      New York Bakery

      Brand details

      See below for inspiration across the range
      Perfect for breakfast
      Sweet Breakfast - The Original Bagel, toasted and topped with cream cheese, blueberries & honey

      Great choice for Lunch
      Lunch Favourite - Wholemeal Bagel topped with crushed avocado, crumbled feta and flecks of chilli

      Sweet Treat - Cinnamon & Raisin Bagel with sliced banana and a light sprinkle of cinnamon
